message: Bob, I'm excited you're interested in this product. It's truly one-of-a-kind. Given its unique value and my bottom line, my initial offer is $1150000.
Alice, while I appreciate the offer, $1150000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to offer $1050000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you considering the value of this product. My absolute lowest I can go is $1080000. This is my final offer. I am very close to selling to another buyer.
